title: [Various body movements using simple apparatus]

description: A group of British school children demonstrate body movements using various types of apparatus, eg balance beams, hoops, boxes, mats and bars. The teacher stimulates the children by making them vary their movements and using the apparatus in many different ways - each movement flowing into the next.
